Classes.Description: High intensity interval training. Short bursts of intense exercise with low intensity recovery periods. An efficient, effective, and fun form of cardio that boosts heart rate. All levels welcome.
A low intensity workout focused on building strength while improving flexibility through controlled body weight movement. All levels are welcome.
A group fitness experience on a stationary bike! Great for everyone, male, female, conditioned, deconditioned, because YOU control your pace and resistance.

A fun total body strength training workout in a non-intimidating setting! Utilize a variety of equipment (free weights, elastic bands, fitness balls...) and body weight exercises ( squats, lunges, planks...) to tone and strengthen the body. Exercise modifications are always offered and all fitness levels are welcome.
Move and have fun in the water to a variety of upbeat music for an invigorating workout. All fitness levels are welcome.
